Room.Name: Avatar Ruins Outer Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the outer path circling the northern mountain.
Room.LongDescription: It's not really a mountain that you see, but it's the closest thing you can think of that resembles what you're looking at. The massive structure juts out of the surface, seemingly out of nothingness. The jagged edges and sharp points make it relatively unclimbable.
